title: Resolve db self-join memory bug
body:
Add comprehensive self-join tests to verify correct behavior and investigate a reported cartesian product bug.

The bug report described self-joins causing memory exhaustion and cartesian products. These new tests, including scenarios with larger datasets and `limit`, demonstrate that the core `db` join logic correctly handles self-joins without producing cartesian products. This suggests the reported issue might stem from the `useLiveQuery` integration or an environment-specific factor, as the underlying join mechanism appears to be working as expected.
